Greetings to Guinean President 
   Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Lansana Conte, president of Guinea, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would favorably develop in the future, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Guinea successes in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Mongolian Democratic Socialist Women's Union.
 D. Altai, chairwoman of the union who is leading the delegation, handed the gift to an official concerned.

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas
   Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Chief of the Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 It was handed to an official concerned on Monday by Mohammad Shahta Zarab, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK.
